title: Software Tools and Techniques Laboratory
description: Hands-on exploration of software development tools and techniques. Investigation of the scientific process as applied to software development and debugging. Emphasis is on weekly hands-on laboratory experiences, development of laboratory notebooking techniques as applied to software design. Prerequisites: CSE 8B or CSE 11 or CSE 12 or DSC 30; restricted to undergraduates. Graduate students will be allowed as space permits.
